note: Title from title of first text (f. 1r)

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Collection of 26 texts of the Druze community.

persName.#text: Ḥamzah ibn ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad, active 1015-1020
Muqtaná, Bahāʼ al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad, active 1015-1020
مقتنى، بهاء الدين علي بن احمد،
Ḥākim bi-Amr Allāh, Caliph of Egypt, 985-approximately 1021

msItem.title: Risālah al-dāmighah lil-fāsiq al-radd ʻalá al-Nuṣayrī laʻanahu al-Mawlá fī kull kawr wa-dawr
al-Risālah allatī ursilat ilá Walī al-ʻAhd
Risālat Khumār ibn Jaysh al-Sulaymānī al-ʻAkāwī
Dhikr maʻrifat al-Imām wa-asmāʼ al-Ḥudūd al-ʻulwīyah rūḥānī wa-jusmānī
Kitab fihi taqsīm al-ʻulūm wa-ithbāt al-ḥaqq wa-kashf al-maknūn
Shiʻr al-Nafs wa-mā tawfīqī illā billāh
Nuskhat mā katabahu al-Qarmaṭī ilá mawlānā al-Ḥākim

supportDesc.extent: 108 leaves : 160 x 120 (130 x 110) mm bound to 160 x 120 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation added in pencil, upper left recto; catchwords every verso, lower left.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; pointed, vocalized.

binding.p: Black leather over pasteboard with mostly effaced blind-stamped frame. Marbled paper doublures. Endbands in pink and green. Binding has been repaired with a piece of textile over the back cover spine hinge.

origin.p: The item is not dated. Perhaps copied in the 18th or 19th century.
